author: Special Correspondent
text:
The body of a 30-year-old man was found on the railway track at Velachery Station on Saturday evening. “We are trying to ascertain the identity of the victim. We are also checking if he tried to cross the track, fell from a running train or if it was a case of suicide,” said a Government Railway Police officer.

Man enters Coast Guard compound

A man, suspected to be mentally unstable, jumped into the Indian Coast Guard officer compound in Kasimedu on Friday night.

The police patrol team spotted the man scaling the walls and found that he was not mentally stable.
title: Body found on railway track
